archimate:Requirement.name: 4.68.7 Security incident reporting control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Confirmed security incidents should be reported to the relevant entities a) recommending appropriate response activities to the incident response team for handling the given incident and remediating the threat b) recording all information about the incident, including corrective actions taken, for a comprehensive post-incident report to both internal stakeholders and external bodies (e.g. regulators, law enforcement or other government agencies) c) conducting a review of the entire security event management process before closing the incident, so that any lessons learnt can be applied to improve security event management.
